title: Enhancing App Development Competencies: Improving Emotional Intelligence in Team Learning Through Phenomenological Diary Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Team project experience and comprehension of basic emotional management concepts
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can improve emotional recognition and management skills through a three-stage process (daily journaling-feedback-reconstruction) during an 8-week team project
Learners connect team conflict situations to reflective problem analysis and alternative planning through at least three cycles of phenomenological diary analysis
Learners visually map emotional interactions occurring in team learning processes using digital tools and produce interpretive reports
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
